name: Storia Stories
storyline: One day, a white rabbit appears in front of the protagonist and invites her into the world of “Storia”, which is a world full of countries that are based on classic fairy tales. However, the evil "Dream Killers" have stopped these fairy tales from ending in the way they should. If nothing is done, then happy endings will be no more. As the "Girl of destiny", the protagonist is determined to save the world, and goes on an adventure to fix these stories that have been distorted. Will the protagonist see a happy ending?
summary: Included in the Story Me app.
